item.title: Captivated By Samsung’s Android Phone
item.description: Ready for the newest smartphones? Check out the Samsung Captivate, available through AT&T. It’s a fast, sleek, and runs on the Android operating system – specifically, the Galaxy Android version. The Samsung Galaxy series is creating a lot of excitement. These phones will have different names depending on the carrier. The Captivate is specifically designed for AT&T’s network, and it lives up to its name! This phone pushes the boundaries of slimness, measuring a mere 0.

item.title: FREE HTC Wildfire S White For The Holidays
item.description: The HTC Wildfire S, a stylish white smartphone available from T-Mobile, is a popular choice for the holidays. This sought-after Android phone can be yours for free, making the season even brighter. What makes the Wildfire S so appealing? It might be the way this smart device focuses on people, organizing communication by individuals instead of apps. Its multi-window browsing feature allows for efficient multitasking. The Wildfire S stands out for its compact size, measuring a mere 4.

item.title: Fascinated By The Samsung Fascinate
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S series is a highly sought-after line of smartphones, offering a combination of style and advanced technology. The Samsung Fascinate, available through Verizon Wireless, is the newest member of this family. The Fascinate lives up to its name with a vivid 4-inch Super AMOLED display that’s easily viewable indoors and out. Its 1 GHz Hummingbird processor ensures smooth handling of demanding multimedia applications. The phone also boasts a 5-megapixel camera with autofocus and HD video recording capabilities, complemented by a DivX video player and an MP3 music player.
